description: This file defines a UI Button component using the LightningJS framework. It includes a template with dynamic text content based on the component's state, manages internal state, and handles user input to toggle the 'favorited' status.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing an interactive button that toggles its 'favorited' state upon user input.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
